terra.confirmDisconnect:
Are you sure you want to disconnect {{provider}}?

This will completely remove the connection and revoke the OAuth token. A new authorization will be required for reuse.
terra.confirmDeauth:
Are you sure you want to completely remove the {{provider}} connection?

This will revoke the OAuth token on the {{provider}} side and delete the record. After this, you can reconnect the device.
